title: Fab hotel at perfect location.aoart from the parking issue would highly recommend this hotel.lovely breakfast
text: Fab hotel at perfect location.aoart from the parking issue would highly recommend this hotel.lovely breakfast and the wifi was of a excellent standard as it was not too bad for free wifi this was a brilliant stay for me
